may have mood swings, feel 
tearful or be easily irritated. For 
a while you may feel that you 
cannot control your emotions, 
but these symptoms should 
ease	after	the	first	three

Boy or girl?
Every normal human cell 
contains 46 chromosomes, 
except for male sperm and 
female eggs. These contain 
23 chromosomes each. When 
a sperm fertilises an egg, the 
23 chromosomes from the 
father pair with the 23 from the 
mother, making 46 in all.
